EmailTemplate.name: 2020_Greenhouse_IMUs_Ongoing-Lead-Dark_Nurture.Email 1: Checking In
EmailTemplate.subject: Checking In
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
At one time you had interest in speaking to someone about our HGuide inertial measurement unit or inertial navigation products.
Did you get the information you needed? If not, please reply to this email.
We look forward to speaking with you.
Best,
The HGuide Support Team
